src_original: rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po'i snga ltas ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la/_rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan par mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu zhes 'og ma rnams la'ang sbyar ro/_/
tgt_original: 「復次，善男子！ 菩薩初地相能見三千佛剎土滿中億千那由他伏藏； 二地能見三千佛剎土坦然平整以眾寶暐曄莊嚴；

src_original: sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/_bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go cha sra ba thogs nas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo /_/
tgt_original: 三地能見諸力士為降伏怨敵；

src_original: sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs bzhi ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/_me tog sna tshhogs kyis mngon par
tgt_original: 四地能見四方有諸風輪來，有種種妙華遍布其地；

src_original: sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyis dbu la me tog tsham pa ka'i phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo /_/
tgt_original: 五地能見眾妓女以眾寶瓔珞其身，上有憂鉢羅華天冠、薝蔔華天冠、婆師迦華天冠、阿提目多伽華天冠而為嚴容；

src_original: sa drug pa'i snga ltas ni/_rdzing them kas bzhi dang ldan pa'i gser gyi bye ma brdal ba rnyog pa med cing dang ba la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang /_me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu ta dang /_pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chur mthong ste/_de la bdag nyid rtshe dga' zhing longs su spyod pa mthong ngo /_/
tgt_original: 六地見眾寶池八功德水湛然盈滿，其池四邊有七寶階道底布金沙，自見己身在此池中嬉戲娛樂；

src_original: sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis nas sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/_de nas bdag nyid ma gnod ma nyams par
tgt_original: 七地見其左右有諸地獄，而從中過無諸艱難；

src_original: slar ldog par mthong ngo /_/ sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/_phrag pa gnyis na ri dwags kyi rgyal po seng ge
tgt_original: 八地自見兩肩上有師子王，形容端嚴，頭上有幡，有大威力降伏眾獸；
